ISSUE.TITLE: Post query returns json_invalid_query for valid query
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If you do a query that happens to have no results (e.g. `cat=2` where the category has no posts), you get back a 404 and a `json_invalid_query` error. This should just be an empty JSON list, and not an error.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Return an empty array for valid queries that don't return any results.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update zero results unit test to match expectations in #862. - Return 200 response. - Return empty array list.
